ygData.subject: OOC the spider thing...
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Okay, I have commited the crime. I ve actually made too many OOC posts. Please don t mind this one. I was feeling really bad and couldn t wait to attack

OOC: Okay, I have commited the crime. I've actually made too many OOC posts.
Please don't mind this one. I was feeling really bad and couldn't wait to
attack someone, and I should have kept my mouth shut about the spider
cruelty thing. It may be a bit cruel, but it's not like anyone's actually
hurting spiders. (looks evilly and menacingly at Cyberwolf because of his
comment) Really, no matter what you kill in your posts you are going to
offend someone. Probably unless it's a moquito or a cockroach, nobody likes
them for obvious reasons. It was a storyline thing, not a slaughter because
of personal hatred towards spiders, so again, I say I should have kept my
mouth shut. Sorry everyone, just the ill natured side of me was typing and
waiting to strike at someone to try and set his anger at ease. Should have
took my anger out on something else, I know, but I was rabid. Stupid me...
